Title: Not following the Checks-Effects-Interactions Pattern
Content:
[Solidity recommends the usage of the Check-Effects-Interaction Pattern](https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.5.4/security-considerations.html#use-the-checks-effects-interactions-pattern) to avoid potential problems, like reentrancy.


In a couple of places the code of Solo the checks are not done first:


* [The invalid oracle price check in](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/blob/17df84db351d5438e1b7437572722b4f52c8b2b4/contracts/protocol/impl/AdminImpl.sol#L257)[\_`setPriceOracle`](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/blob/17df84db351d5438e1b7437572722b4f52c8b2b4/contracts/protocol/impl/AdminImpl.sol#L257).
* [The primary account check in](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/blob/17df84db351d5438e1b7437572722b4f52c8b2b4/contracts/protocol/impl/OperationImpl.sol#L287) [`verifyFinalState`](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/blob/17df84db351d5438e1b7437572722b4f52c8b2b4/contracts/protocol/impl/OperationImpl.sol#L287).


While in these cases there is no risk of reentrancy, consider moving the checks to the start of the corresponding block to make sure that no issues are introduced by later changes.


***Update:*** *Partially fixed in* [*pull request #193*](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/pull/193)*. The dYdX team* [*does not plan to update the*](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/issues/208#issuecomment-479973004)[*\_`verifyFinalState`*](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/issues/208#issuecomment-479973004) [*`function`*](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/issues/208#issuecomment-479973004)*.*
